thistemplate 0.0.1
    • Theming with bslib and thematic
  • Reference

thistemplate

A theme and template for pkgdown page. Such as: inferCSN.

Usage

_pkgdown.yml 

template:
  package: thistemplate

navbar:
  components:
    github:
      icon: fab fa-github fa-lg
      href: The link of package # Such as: https://github.com/mengxu98/inferCSN

DESCRIPTION 

Config/Needs/website: mengxu98/thistemplate

Acknowledge

The thistemplate package referred bslib package, gadenbuie’s grkgdown package and mlr3pkgdowntemplate package.
